publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-10 19:09:05 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into two series: Web crawls and Unprocessed accessions.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Beelzebubs is an all-male a capella group that was founded at Tufts University in 1963 by Bill Amidon, Don Avery, Barrie Bruce, and Neal Robison.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: Web sites were crawled by Archive-It. Web crawl information updated in finding aid annually.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records and web crawls from the Tufts University all-male a capella group the Beelzebubs. Materials include two of their albums and videos and photographs from their 2006 trip to Greece.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research. This collection may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

controlaccess.subject: Student life
Student Activities -- Student Government, Clubs, and Organizations
Student Activities -- Performing Arts

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Quarterly web crawls of the Tufts Beelzebubs websites crawled by DCA, as part of the Student Organizations web collection, to document the presesence of Tufts University student organizations on the web.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: To see all of websites crawled as part of the Student Organizations web collection, please visit https://archive-it.org/collections/6387

did.unittitle: Tufts University Beelzebubs Tour in Greece

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This digital object contains photographs and video footage from a Beelzebubs tour in Greece.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This digital object contains audio files from the Beelzebubs' 2005 release, Shedding.

Track listing: 1) Let's Get It Started (Black Eyed Peas) 2) Better Days / Where It's At (Citizen King / Beck) 3) Pony (Ginuwine) 4) Everybody Wants to Rule the World (Tears for Fears) 5) Ladies' Night (Kool and the Gang) 6) Trouble (Coldplay) 7) Someday I Suppose (Mighty Mighty Bosstones) 8) Let's Go (Cars) 9) Epiphany (Staind) 10) The Distance (Cake) 11) Heavy Things (Phish) 12) Boulevard of Broken Dreams (Green Day) 13) Hurt (Nine Inch Nails) 14) Paranoid Android (Radiohead) 14) You Can't Always Get What You Want (Rolling Stones)

2004-2005 Group Members: Jeff Markowitz (Pres), Matt Michelson (BM), Sean Zinsmeister (MD), Chris Kidd (Historian), Richard VanOrnum, Kyron Rogers, Kyle Crossley, Eric Fuerstein, Arkady Ho, Matthew Kraft, Andrew Savini, Theron Corbin, Ben Kelsey, Doug Terry, Chris VanLenten, Lucas Walker

2003-2004 Group Members: Taylor Horst (Pres), Jeff Markowitz (BM), Ed Boyer (MD), Chris Kidd (Historian), Paul Bonewitz, Kyle Crossley, Peter Fallon, Eric Fuerstein, Arkady Ho, Matt Kraft, Matt Michelson, Kyron Rogers, Andrew Savini, Sean Zinsmeister

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This digital object contains audio files from the Beelzebubs' 2002 release, Punch.

1) Elevation (U2) 2) The Space Between (Dave Matthews Band) 3) It's Oh So Quiet (Bjork) 4) Who Put the Bomp 5) Rockin' Robin 6) A Hundred Pounds of Clay 7) Duke of Earl 8) More Love 9) From Sunday 10) Those Shoes (The Eagles) 11) Ain't No Sunshine (Bill Withers) 12) In the End (Linkin Park) 13) Abby Road Suite (The Beatles) 14) Brothers, Sing On!
